messages.subject: Re:  Views of unschooling (was something else)
messages.msgSnippet: ... There are many, many posts here from one or more (actually, it s more) of the nice people who so often say you re off topic -- regarding facets of
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2297
>Date: Tue, Aug 27, 2002, 2:12 PM
>

> Will one (or more) of the nice people who so often say that I'm
> off topic please tell us their views of unschooling, without complaining
> about my posts or my views, or anyone else's?


There are many, many posts here from one or more (actually, it's more) of
the nice people who so often say you're off topic -- regarding facets of
unschooling as pertain to shakespeare, dyslexia, living in one place vs. the
nomadic lifestyle, and more.

People are telling their views, it's all here for the reading.

Pam
